title: Cognitive Science and Active Inference
description: Application of Active Inference to cognitive science, including perception, attention, memory, and decision making.
learning_objectives: Apply Active Inference to cognitive processes
Analyze decision making in cognitive tasks

content.overview: Active Inference provides a unifying framework for understanding cognitive processes. It explains how the brain implements perception, attention, memory, and decision making through hierarchical predictive coding and free energy minimization.
